#Text=No un-Islamic hairdo , makeup , or ties for Iranian men
#Text=Monday , April 30 , 2007
#Text=New reports have emerged detailing the extent of the efforts by the Iranian government to purge Western cultural influence in Iran that is deemed un-Islamic .
#Text=Based on Iran 's Islamic Sharia law , non-compliance results in legal punishment because the state sees itself responsible in executing punishment for Islamic theological sins .

#Text=Newspaper headlines such as " Western hairstyles ... have been banned " re-iterated the legal status of Western hairstyles ; barbers who offer to what officials consider un-Islamic hairdos , provide make-up services , and pluck eyebrows have been warned that they can face month-long suspension or revocation of their licenses .
#Text=Barber clients who violate government policies will be subject to lashes , fines and imprisonment .
#Text=Iranian male youth are not supposed to sport outlandish hairstyles or use gel to make their hair stand .
#Text=Additionally , the ban on neckties remains in place .
#Text=This ban evades the attention of those outside Iran
#Text=albeit attentive observers realize that , for example , not one of non-clerical members of the Iranian government wears a necktie .
#Text=Vice squad police are in place to bring non-compliant individuals to Islamic justice .
#Text=Mahmoud Ahmadinejad has called for moderation and consideration for Iran 's image worldwide emphasizing the need for a " cultural rather than disciplinary approach . "

column1: #Text=Hard-line clerics stress that both approaches are needed .
#Text=Many Iranian women have appeared on state television whereon they praised Islamic dress code effusively and advocated the arrest of offenders .
#Text=The Supreme Cultural Revolution Council , created during the Islamic Cultural Revolution , indicated that it would filter immoral video and audio messages sent using cellular phones .
#Text=According to Iranian television statement , " In order to prevent possible misuse of MMS , immoral actions and social problems , the Telecommunications Ministry will filter immoral MMS . "
#Text=No details of how immoral messages would be filtered such naming the type of software to be used were divulged .
#Text=Grand Ayatollah Ali Khamenei explicitly delineated the threats Iran faces on the cultural front ,
#Text=“ More than Iran 's enemies need artillery , guns and so forth , they need to spread cultural values that lead to moral corruption .
#Text=They have said this many times .
#Text=I recently read in the news that one of them , a senior official in an important American political center , said : " Instead of bombs , send them miniskirts . "
#Text=He is right .

#Text=If they arouse sexual desires in any given country , if they spread unrestrained mixing of men and women , and if they lead youth to behavior to which they are naturally inclined by instincts , there will no longer be any need for artillery and guns against that nation . ”
#Text=Following the Islamic Revolution , the Revolutionary Guards is reported to have cut women ’s lips with razors because the women were wearing lipstick .
#Text=This was done in public view to deter others .
